name: Rampage Agents
abstract: Rampage Agents is a VR game that fuses battle royale with multi-player action adventure games. Obtain powerful agents with unique powers and team up with your friends now!

detail.app_release_note:
1. Migrate game data to AWS servers.
2. Fully optimize game frame rate.
3. Add the prep area feature in Battle Royale mode.
4. Update content for the new season.
5. Adjust elemental effects in Battle Royale mode.
6. Adjust some of Claire's skill effects in Battle Royale mode.
7. Update English voice lines for characters in Battle Royale mode.
8. Adjust and optimize some scene models in Pandora Valley.
9. Add a hit slowdown mechanism in Battle Royale mode.
10. Update the agent unlocking feature.
11. Adjust the attributes and feel of some weapons.
12. Optimize the Sniper scope mode.
13. Update AI logic in Battle Royale mode.
14. Optimize the HUD.
15. Update the smoke effects for Sensor Smoke in Battle Royale mode.
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO 4 Pro, PICO 4, PICO Neo3 Link, PICO 4 Ultra
